entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
